title¶

Encapsulate a function call and act as a proxy for methods that are called on the result of that function. The function is not evaluated until one of the methods on the result is called.

get_initial()[source]¶

Sets initial value of is_revision to False. It’s a hidden field, so this value will also be the actual value. Used for the different behaviour for this class’ subclasses
